name: Support Emanuele on his brave post-exam climb on mount Kilimanjaro
description: On an attempt to support Unicef and the British Heart foundation me and a few collegaues from Imperial College London are climbing mount Kilimanjaro.

name: Support James Redden on his expedition on the South pole
description: The Route will start off at the 6th degree on the polar ice and finish at the 1st degree, the south pole, covering a distance of 123km.

name: Support Pani's quest in Pintos land
